moves.1. d4:
please note that i will use these abbreviations : N = knight, B = bishop, o-o or o-o-o = castling, K = king, Q = queen,              R = rock, !! = very good move, ! = good move, ?? = very bad move, ? = bad move, !? = may be good, may be bad.
1. d4
to be in the center.
moves.2. c4: to get black out of the center.
moves.4... e6: to enforce the center pawn and to open the way for the bishop, but closing the way of the other B. preparing to pin the N. !?
moves.5... Bb4: to develop and pin the knight.
moves.7... Re8: to be ready for the coming battle.
moves.9... Nbd7: developing the knight and preparing to jump to e5 in the near future.
moves.10. h3: to prevent the knight from coming to g4.
moves.10... e5: hoping to advance to e4 to fork (B and N) or Nxe5.
moves.11. e4: to be fully in the center and to stop my plan. !
moves.11... exd4: to attack N and to open the way to N in d7 to jump to e5 if Nxd4.
moves.13. cxd5: 13. cxd5 ??, bad move because there is unprotected B. ??
moves.14... Nxb2: fleeing from the R,capturing a pawn and attacking Q. !?
moves.15. Qb3: to block the return way for black N preparing to capture it. !
moves.15... Qb6: to save the N even by trading queens. !
moves.17... Bd7: to enforce protection of the pawn in b5.
moves.18. Rf3: may be to put R in a better position. ?
moves.18... Nxe4: to capture a pawn and attack B, or trading black N with white N and a pawn. !
moves.20. Rc1: to enforce protection of the white N.
moves.20... Nxc3: trading knights.  i think it is good because i am 4 points ahead. may be Be5 better !?
moves.21. Bd2: 21. bd2  ?? should capture the N with the R. very bad move.
moves.21... b4: 21. ... b4 !! to defend N and to protect Q after the winning jump of the N. very good move.
moves.22. a3: to break the defense in the wrong time. ??
moves.22... Ne2+:
22. ... Ne2+. !! forking K and R. very good move.
at this position white resigned. conclusion : 1- my opponent is a good chess player, he made a mistake, but we all do mistakes. 2- annotation is a very hard job, i hope that my friend the reader will appreciate what i have done and may be the beginners will learn some thing. 3- your advice and comments will be appreciated with my thanks. 4- i like you all. 5- thank you. 6- a lot of thanks to GameKnot. friend of all mustafa.
